scripts.setup: npx --yes stmux -w error -e ERROR -m system -M -- [ "npm run setup:reapply" : "npm run setup:ext" ]
scripts.setup:ext: cd trracked_cells && pip install -e . && jupyter labextension develop --overwrite . && jupyter server extension enable trracked_cells &&  cd ..
scripts.dev: npx --yes stmux -w always -e ERROR -m system -M -t "Dev" -- [ "npm run dev:ext" .. "npm run dev:lab" ]
scripts.publish:reapply: cd reapply && poetry build && . /home/vscode/pypi/pypirc && poetry publish && cd ..
scripts.publish:ext: cd trracked_cells && jlpm build && jlpm publish
